fields.name: Cooldown
fields.description: the amount of time to wait since the last scaling action before this action occurs. It must be between 1 week and 1 minute in ISO 8601 format.

fields.name: Direction
fields.description: the scale direction. Whether the scaling action increases or decreases the number of instances.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: the type of action that should occur when the scale rule fires.

fields.name: Value
fields.description: the number of instances that are involved in the scaling action. This value must be 1 or greater. The default value is 1.
